modify_description: Changed step 61 ExecutionAgent output from text request to run_code tool call without required code_to_run parameter
Tool response returns MissingParameterError: 'code_to_run' is a required parameter
Updated steps 62-69 analysis to reference tool error + ongoing dataset inaccessibility

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:15:00", "root cause component": "cartservice-0", "root cause reason": "container memory load"}}
original_correct_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}}
wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:15:00", "root cause component": "cartservice-0", "root cause reason": "container memory load"}}
causality_chain: step61: run_code tool call missing required code_to_run parameter -> tool returns MissingParameterError -> agent cannot attempt data access -> FinalAgent infers wrong root cause
